description: Create a new plot and make it the current (i.e., active) plot. If no name is specified, one is assigned by default.

keywords.name: s
keywords.description: Name for the new plot. If not specified, a default name is assigned.

examples.description: Create a new plot with a default name

python_sdk_alternative.workaround: itasca.command('plot create <name>') - no direct Python SDK method
